measured_by: accuracy in the two-cue zookeeper task / response time in the two-cue zookeeper task
justification: “A two-way rmANOVA with color and orientation ambiguity … revealed significant interaction effects on both accuracy … and response time …, suggesting the significant effect of WM integration on performance.”

measured_by: log-loss values from the reinforcement-learning model
justification: “The log loss analysis of the learning model revealed an improvement in model prediction across trials, suggesting that participants learned the task representations.”

measured_by: Akaike Information Criterion (AIC) comparison of probabilistic vs. deterministic models
justification: “The probability model best predicted the subject's response and demonstrated the lowest AIC values among the four competing models.”
